description:
root@controller:~# gnocchi metric list
The request you have made requires authentication. (HTTP 401)


dpkg -l | grep ceilometer
ii  ceilometer-agent-central             1:8.0.1-0ubuntu2~cloud0                      all          ceilometer central agent
ii  ceilometer-agent-compute             1:8.0.1-0ubuntu2~cloud0                      all          ceilometer compute agent
ii  ceilometer-agent-notification        1:8.0.1-0ubuntu2~cloud0                      all          ceilometer notification agent
ii  ceilometer-collector                 1:8.0.1-0ubuntu2~cloud0                      all          ceilometer collector service
ii  ceilometer-common                    1:8.0.1-0ubuntu2~cloud0                      all          ceilometer common files
ii  python-ceilometer                    1:8.0.1-0ubuntu2~cloud0                      all          ceilometer python libraries
ii  python-ceilometerclient              2.8.0-0ubuntu1~cloud0                        all          Client library for Openstack Ceilometer API server - Python 2.7
ii  python-ceilometermiddleware          1.0.2-0ubuntu1~cloud0                        all          OpenStack Telemetry middleware for generating metrics - Python 2.x
root@controller:~# dpkg -l | grep gnocchi
ii  gnocchi-api                          3.1.2-0ubuntu1~cloud0                        all          Metric as a Service - API daemon
ii  gnocchi-common                       3.1.2-0ubuntu1~cloud0                        all          Metric as a Service - common files
ii  gnocchi-metricd                      3.1.2-0ubuntu1~cloud0                        all          Metric as a Service - metric daemon
ii  gnocchi-statsd                       3.1.2-0ubuntu1~cloud0                        all          Metric as a Service - statsd daemon
ii  python-gnocchi                       3.1.2-0ubuntu1~cloud0                        all          Metric as a Service - Python 2.x
ii  python-gnocchiclient                 3.1.1-0ubuntu2~cloud0                        all          bindings to the OpenStack Gnocchi API - Python 2.7
title: gnocchi (HTTP 401)
